pages.text: Mana Catalysts are blocks that increase the max mana of all players within a radius. Each catalyst has a different range and mana increase depending on the tier. The Normal has a range of 16 and boost of $(#2895CB)50$(), Diamond has a range of 22 and boost of $(#2895CB)100$(), and Netherite has a range of 34 and boost of $(#2895CB)200$().
